summary: Combatnecro blonde follower with UNP HDT body
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds to your game [color=#ffff00]Candida[/color], a new follower.
[color=#ff0000][b]Name[/b][/color]: Candida
[color=#ff0000][b]Race[/b][/color]: Nord
[b][color=#ff0000]Class[/color][/b]: CombatNecro  [color=#ff0000][b]Spells[/b][/color]: ConjureDremoraLord, LightingBolt, Thunderbolt, Guardiancircle, Oakflesh and others..
[color=#ff0000][b]Location[/b][/color]: Arcaneum, Winterhold College
[color=#ff0000][b]Level[/b][/color]: levels with the player (10-95)
[color=#ff0000][b]Marriable[/b][/color]: yes
[color=#ff0000][b]Skin[/b][/color]: 4k
[color=#ff0000][b]Body[/b][/color]: UNP HDT        [color=#ff0000][b]Requirements[/b][/color]: XPMSE skeleton and HDT physics extensions
